Test Execution started for -> tc_billPayFromCheckingsToSavings Bill Pay using restAPI Bill payment of $200 is successfull. { "payeeName": "RestApi", "amount": 200, "accountId": 32103 } Verifying amount is deducted correctly from checkings account and balance is updated { "id": 32103, "customerId": 19871, "balance": -100.0, "type": "CHECKING" } Amount deducted from checkings account is correct Verify the last transaction amount for Checkings account Last transaction shows 200 debited from checking account : Debit : 200.0 Test Execution PASSED for -> tc_billPayFromCheckingsToSavings
